description: Try our easy to follow Crispy Chickpea & Almond Nibbles recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Crispy Chickpea & Almond Nibbles Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420g can chickpeas no added salt, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking tray with baking paper.

Rub chickpeas well with paper towel to dry. Place in a bowl with almonds. Add half of the oil and toss well to coat. Sprinkle over paprika, curry powder and 1 tsp of salt flakes. Toss well to coat. Transfer to tray and bake for 45 minutes, turning every 15 minutes, until golden. Set aside to cool.

Meanwhile, stir honey, remaining oil and oregano in a small pan over low heat. Add chickpeas and nuts and toss to coat. Return to tray, sprinkle with remaining salt and cook for a further 10-15 minutes until golden and crisp. Cool on tray. Serve.
